definition: ticket/ballot/banknote/CL:張|张[zhang1]/person held for ransom/amateur performance of Chinese opera/classifier for groups, batches, business transactions

sentences.english: Most importantly, this album has a stamp of Metallica written all over it.
sentences.chinese: 最重要的是，這張專輯的郵票金屬書面所有權。

sentences.english: He liked most animals stamps, he likes to make friends with like-minded friends.
sentences.chinese: 他最喜歡動物郵票，他喜歡結交情趣相投朋友。

sentences.english: Please stick this stamp to the envelope before you mail the letter.
sentences.chinese: 在你寄出這封信之前，請把這張郵票貼在信封上。

sentences.english: Attach a stamp to the envelop and mail it.
sentences.chinese: 把郵票貼在信封上寄出去。

sentences.english: To examine and approve the annual plans of commemorative and special stamps;
sentences.chinese: 負責審定紀念郵票和特種郵票年度計劃。

sentences.english: To examine and approve the annual plans of commemorative and special stamps;
sentences.chinese: 負責審定紀念郵票和特種郵票年度計劃。

sentences.english: She showed her stamp collection to me.
sentences.chinese: 她把她集的郵票給我看。

sentences.english: If so, you must have put stamps on the letters before you sent them. So how did people receive letters before stamps were invented, and who came up with the idea of using stamps?
sentences.chinese: 如果寄過，那你一定在寄信之前在信封上貼上了郵票。

sentences.english: This year is also the 12th year of the French post office, La Poste, issuing Chinese New Year stamps.
sentences.chinese: 今年也是法國郵政局發行中國新年郵票第12年。

sentences.english: You can separate the stamps along the perforated line.
sentences.chinese: 你可以順着齒孔線把郵票撕開。

sentences.english: Finally, he sweated the stamp for 5 years.
sentences.chinese: 經過五年的不懈努力，他終於搞到了那張郵票。

sentences.english: Tw0 8-cent stamps. please. Was there anything else?
sentences.chinese: 兩張八分郵票。別的還有什麼？

sentences.english: This commemorative stamp is hereby printed to mark the 60th anniversary of the establishment of the Civil Aviation of China.
sentences.chinese: 爲紀念新中國民航成立60週年，特印刷此紀念郵票。

sentences.english: The stamps will be auctioned tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 郵票集將在明天進行拍賣出售。

sentences.english: He showed his friends the precious stamps which he has collected these years.
sentences.chinese: 他把這些年來所蒐集的珍貴郵票拿給朋友看。

sentences.english: Robey left New York without having made a sale, and stopped in Philadelphia on the way home.
sentences.chinese: 羅比沒有賣出郵票離開紐約，回家的路上他停腳費城。

definition: paper money/a bill (e.g. 100 yuan)/CL:張|张[zhang1],紮|扎[za1]
to publish/to issue (stocks, currency etc)/to release/to distribute (a film)
